title: Robust Domestic Credit System
description: In 2022, Vietnam's net domestic credit reached an impressive 12,108 trillion VND, showcasing a strong financial backbone. This positions Vietnam among the top countries globally in terms of domestic credit availability.

title: Efficient Tax System Operations
description: Vietnam achieved a high score of 89.85 in 2024 for the operational efficiency of its tax systems, reflecting a streamlined and effective taxation process.

title: Gender Equality Progress
description: In 2015, Vietnam's CPIA gender equality rating was 4.5, indicating significant strides towards gender equality, although there's room for improvement.

title: Strong Export Capacity
description: Vietnam's exports of goods and services in 2023 amounted to 5,429 trillion VND, highlighting its robust export sector and capacity to import.

title: Positive External Balance
description: In 2023, Vietnam maintained a positive external balance on goods and services, with a surplus of 820 trillion VND, reflecting a healthy trade position.

title: High Net Secondary Income
description: Vietnam's net secondary income from abroad in 2023 was 311 trillion VND, indicating strong remittance flows and international financial support.

title: Terms of Trade Advantage
description: In 2023, Vietnam's terms of trade adjustment was valued at 479 trillion VND, suggesting favorable trade conditions and pricing.

title: Broad Money Supply
description: Vietnam's broad money supply reached 13,110 trillion VND in 2022, reflecting a substantial monetary base supporting economic activities.

title: Balanced Import-Export Ratio
description: In 2023, Vietnam's imports of goods and services were closely matched with exports, totaling 5,365 trillion VND, indicating a balanced trade approach.

title: GDP Discrepancy Challenge
description: Vietnam faced a GDP expenditure discrepancy of -350 trillion VND in 2023, highlighting potential issues in economic data accuracy.
